divs: Sighting DetailsMe and My friend was watching some sports on tv in my livingroom i have a great view from there of the river and out of the dark we both at the same time got distracted from the tv set to a green light outside in the pitch dark night it was obvious it had greenish light triangular it dropped down a few feet like a drop of rain we both looked at each other askin if we saw that. felt like omg what just happened what was that we both ran to the window and stared for 10minutes but it had desappeared. im writting this months after because i cant get the feeling and image out of my head me and my friend.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There were no other sightings in Montreal on or around April 14th 2010
Summary: triangular green lights dropping like a "rain drop" from high in the sky
